description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for various electrical supplies. All deliverables are requested no later than 31 March 2024.
duration_in_months: The Proposed period of contract:All the deliverables are requested no later than 31 March 2024.
full_summary:
Online Tender Notice
New Brunswick
Department of National Defence
Combat Training Centre
Oromocto, New Brunswick
E2V 4J5

**Tender Details**

*   **Reference Number**: W2037-240007/B
*   **Tender Status**: Expired
*   **Procurement Category**: GD
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering

**Scope of Work**

The Department of National Defence, Combat Training Centre, requires various electrical supplies for the Department of National Defence.

**Delivery**

All deliverables are expected to be completed on or before March 31, 2024.

**Eligibility**

This tender is restricted to Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

*   Anixter Canada Inc.
*   Graybar Canada
*   Nedco-Rexel
*   Wesco
*   Lumen
*   Eddy Group
*   KGPCo
*   Newark Element 14
*   Westburne-Rexel
*   ECS Electrical
*   Bird Stairs
*   KVA Protection
*   RS Americas (Canada)
*   Axsera
*   Keverest

**Contracting Authority**

*   Nicole Shannon
*   Telephone: (506) 422-7075
*   E-mail: Nicole.Shannon@forces.gc.ca

**Notice URL**

None available

**Attachment**

Relevant documents are available upon request through the Canada Buys website:

*   [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5722/20230412_cfsme_24007n_npp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5722/20230412_cfsme_24007n_npp_en.pdf) (English)
*   [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5722/20230412_cfsme_24007n_npp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5722/20230412_cfsme_24007n_npp_fr.pdf) (French)

**Region of Opportunity**

Canada

**Region of Delivery**

Oromocto, New Brunswick, and New Brunswick
